A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Don't  bother.

This was a joke. Literally made this into a sci-fi comedy. Fight scenes were underwhelming. What they did with Leia during a particular scene (if you see it or already saw it you know what I'm referring to)\, Snoke\, Kylo\, and Luke most importantly was disgraceful after a two year build up to this.

Why only ONE star: This movie is not action packed\, it doesn't make you think\, or wonder. The magic of the previous films is missing from this. This was a classic Disney forced humor movie with a very simplistic plot that was drawn out.

Without spoiling it just skip it. This has 0 to do with expecting The Empire Strikes Back and more to do with wanting a cohesive story with a powerful villain who is completely evil and not conflicted. 

Recommendation: Use the money on stocking stuffers instead.
